name: Kindling (Kindling Team, Marissa Angell)
description:
CREDITS

This game was made by a group of friends in 3 months as a University project.

  • Marissa Angell - Programming & Narrative
  • Konny Fung - 2D Art & Animations
  • Craig Nash - Level Design & Environment Design
  • Vasilisa Miric - Music & Environment Design
  • Easton Madsen - Environmental Art & QA

Special thanks to Kenney for their public domain assets!
